If patient give consent , patient 's data collect case record form . patient swab posterior fornix around anus collect specimen send microbiology lab per vaginal examination . After patient finish labor , perineal wound swab collect specimen send microbiology lab . Then patient randomize two group , first one receive amoxicillin second one receive placebo . During admission patient exam investigator every day . After patient discharge , follow appoint 6 week later . The infant swab rectum collect specimen send microbiology lab patient 's discharge day . Every specimen culture bacteria perform antimicrobial susceptibility test amoxicillin .
